      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>cc0930dd-a5ab-4fc7-a25e-f64f9ae11fd4#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az archaikus ifjúábárzolás</string>
            <string language="en">representation of the archaic boy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung des veralteten Jungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">représentation du garçon archaïque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">respresentação do menino archaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rappresentazione del ragazzo archaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντιπροσώπευση του αρχαϊ'ζοντος αγοριού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">representación del muchacho arcaico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az archaikus korban az ifjakat (kurosz = fiú, koré = lány) „archaikus mosollyal”, frontálisan, nagyméretű, kőből készült szobrokkal ábrázolták</string>
            <string language="en">representation of the archaic boy</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">archaikus ifjú,  </string>
            <string language="en">archaic boy,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung des veralteten Jungen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">représentation du garçon archaïque</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">respresentação do menino archaic</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rappresentazione del ragazzo archaic</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντιπροσώπευση του αρχαϊ'ζοντος αγοριού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">representación del muchacho arcaico</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">veralteter Junge,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">garçon archaïque,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">menino archaic,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ragazzo archaic,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρχαϊ'ζον αγόρι,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">muchacho arcaico,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
